title: 1 Year Anniversary!!!
itunes:title: 1 Year Anniversary!!!
description: It's The Cigar Authority's 1 Year Anniversary Special!!! Today on The Cigar Authority Victor Vitale, Nick Perdomo and Tony Blake call in to join the big celebration. And Tommy Grella, The Cigar Authority's original co-host, makes a very special appearance. The boys go back in time and smoke the very first cigar they had on the show, and then are put to the ultimate blind smoke challenge. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The 1 Year Anniversary of The Cigar Authority!!!
